about.summary: Create and extract conda packages of various formats

name: conda-package-handling
raw_recipe:

package:
    name: conda-package-handling
    version: 1.7.0
source:

    -   folder: xz
        patches:
            - xz-patches/0001-Add-vs2008-support-via-cmake.patch
            - xz-patches/0002-Add-gettimeofday-for-VS2008.patch
        sha256: 5117f930900b341493827d63aa910ff5e011e0b994197c3b71c08a20228a42df
        url: http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/lzmautils/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
    -   folder: lz4_c
        patches:
            - lz4-c-patches/0001-Add-WindowsTargetPlatformVersion-of-10.0-and-lz4-exe.1.patch
            - lz4-c-patches/0001-Add-WindowsTargetPlatformVersion-of-10.0-and-lz4-exe.2.patch
        sha256: 658ba6191fa44c92280d4aa2c271b0f4fbc0e34d249578dd05e50e76d0e5efcc
        url: https://github.com/lz4/lz4/archive/v1.9.2.tar.gz
    -   folder: libarchive
        patches:
            - libarchive-patches/0001-Add-lib-to-CMAKE_FIND_LIBRARY_PREFIXES-for-lzma.patch
            - libarchive-patches/0002-xar-fix-bad-seek-in-move_reading_point.patch
            - libarchive-patches/0003-VC9-compatibility-test-for-BCryptDeriveKeyPBKDF2.patch
            - libarchive-patches/0004-VC9-compatibility-define-BCRYPT_SUCCESS.patch
            - libarchive-patches/0006-VC-openssl-define-inline-as-__inline.patch
            - libarchive-patches/0007-CMake-VC9-compatibility-ignore-some-warnings.patch
            - libarchive-patches/0008-VC9-compatibility-remove-C99.patch
            - libarchive-patches/0009-CMake-Force-Multi-threaded-DLL-runtime.patch
            - libarchive-patches/0010-Use-CreateSymbolicLinkW-on-Windows-for-symlinks-WIP.patch
        sha256: ba7eb1781c9fbbae178c4c6bad1c6eb08edab9a1496c64833d1715d022b30e2e
        url: https://github.com/libarchive/libarchive/releases/download/v3.3.3/libarchive-3.3.3.tar.gz
build:
    entry_points:
        - cph = conda_package_handling.cli:main
    number: 4
    string: py36h8c4c3a4_4
requirements:
    build:
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - binutils_impl_linux-aarch64 2.34 hb77b82c_9
        - binutils_linux-aarch64 2.34 hfcdf779_27
        - gcc_impl_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 hf17dfc6_14
        - gcc_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 h6232204_27
        - kernel-headers_linux-aarch64 4.18.0 hca5cc2b_10
        - ld_impl_linux-aarch64 2.34 h281f86e_9
        - libgcc-devel_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 h1a28f53_14
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 h8e86211_14
        - libgomp 9.3.0 h8e86211_14
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 hca8aa85_14
        - sysroot_linux-aarch64 2.17 h4744778_10
    host:
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - certifi 2020.6.20 py36h9f0ad1d_0
        - cython 0.29.21 py36h831f99a_0
        - ld_impl_linux-aarch64 2.34 h281f86e_9
        - libffi 3.2.1 h4c5d2ac_1007
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 h8e86211_14
        - libgomp 9.3.0 h8e86211_14
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 hca8aa85_14
        - ncurses 6.2 he1b5a44_1
        - openssl 1.1.1g h516909a_1
        - pip 20.2.2 py_0
        - python 3.6.11 h4d41432_2_cpython
        - python_abi 3.6 1_cp36m
        - readline 8.0 h607064a_2
        - setuptools 49.4.0 py36h9f0ad1d_0
        - sqlite 3.32.3 h283c62a_1
        - tk 8.6.10 hed695b0_0
        - wheel 0.34.2 py_1
        - xz 5.2.5 h6dd45c4_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1007
    run:
        - libgcc-ng >=7.5.0
        - python >=3.6,<3.7.0a0
        - python_abi 3.6.* *_cp36m
        - six
        - tqdm
test:
    commands:
        - pytest cph/tests -k "not test_secure_refusal_to_extract_abs_paths"
    imports:
        - conda_package_handling
        - conda_package_handling.archive_utils_cy
    requires:
        - mock
        - pytest
        - pytest-cov
        - pytest-mock
    source_files:
        - cph/tests
about:
    home: https://github.com/conda/conda-package-handling
    license: BSD-3-Clause
    license_family: BSD
    license_file:
        - cph/LICENSE
        - lz4_c/lib/LICENSE
        - static_deps_licenses/bzip2.txt
        - static_deps_licenses/libarchive.txt
        - static_deps_licenses/zlib.txt
        - static_deps_licenses/zstd.txt
        - xz/COPYING
        - xz/COPYING.GPLv2
        - xz/COPYING.GPLv3
        - xz/COPYING.LGPLv2.1
    summary: Create and extract conda packages of various formats
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - beckermr
        - jjhelmus
        - msarahan
